page.title: 19A day in the life of a child
page.content: I wake up to my alarm clock having a mad fit,I hit the stupid thing it flys off the desk and hits the floor with a thud.Oh no it's Thursday I wish I didn't have to go to school,I'm so tired Istagger out of bed and drag myself to the sink to wash.Then I dress and leap down the stairs and sprint into the kitchen.After I eaten my toast Emma Bills calls for me.Then we walk to school together.First lesson is English,one dead good hour of English.Today we did work for a newspaper.Becky Husband and I did made up horoscopes.After a very boring break we had an hour of E.S but today it was not as good as it usually is. At lunch there was a mad rush to get into the dinner hall because it was the Christmas lunch.Lucky I had sandwiches.
